mapper.select: SELECT cvegeo AS "Clave", nombre AS "Nombre" FROM ce2014.ent WHERE the_geom && ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point},900913), #{buffer}) AND ST_Intersects(the_geom, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}, 900913), #{buffer})) limit 1

SELECT cve_ent AS "Clave_ent", nom_ent AS "Entidad", cve_mun AS "Clave", nombre AS "Municipio" FROM ce2014.mun WHERE the_geom && ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point},900913), #{buffer}) AND ST_Intersects(the_geom, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}, 900913), #{buffer})) limit 1

SELECT
ue AS "V01", h001a AS "V02", h020a AS "V03", h010a AS "v04", i100a AS "V05", k000a AS "V06", m000a AS "V07", q000a AS "V08", a111a AS "V09", a131a AS "V10", k412a AS "V11", k976a AS "V12", r01, r02, r03, r04, r05, r06, r07, r08, r09, r10, r11

ce2014.cat_ce c WHERE e.sector=c.id AND cvegeo=#{cvegeo} AND sector=#{granSector}
